fields.description: Status of offer. One of determinated string (todo: add statused)

fields.description: Maximum amount of people who can uy this offer

fields.description: Json which contains cost for one gas unit and currency.

fields.description: Minimum amount of gas units which user can buy

fields.description: All gas in offer

fields.description: One of string: "gallons, liters"

fields.description: Description of offer

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: Date when offer was created

fields.name: updateAt
fields.description: Last date when offer was updated

fields.name: deletedDate
fields.description: Date when offer was deleted

fields.name: repeatSettings
fields.description: Settings for offer repeating

fields.description: Reference to gas station which makes offer. Can be null if offer was created by brand, not by separate station.

fields.description: Type of fuel in offer

fields.description: Reference to backend user who created ofer
